name: Expand Recurring Billings Events for Implicit Auto-Renewals
description: An Apache Beam batch pipeline that finds all auto-renewals that have implicitly occurred between the given window and creates the corresponding billing events and hisotry entries.

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.label: The inclusive lower bound of the operation window.
parameters.helpText: The inclusive lower bound of the operation window, in ISO 8601 format.

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.label: The exclusive upper bound of the operation window.
parameters.helpText: The exclusive upper bound of the operation window, in ISO 8601 format.

parameters.name: isDryRun
parameters.label: Whether this job is a dry run.
parameters.helpText: If true, no changes will be saved to the database.

parameters.name: advanceCursor
parameters.label: Whether the BILLING_TIME global cursor should be advanced.
parameters.helpText: If true, after all expansions are persisted, the cursor will be changed from startTime to endTime.
